alert.note: Alert for Keith; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 6:54PM CDT until May 29 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Perkins County in southwestern Nebraska... Southeastern Keith County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 630 PM MDT. * At 553 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Big Springs to Amherst, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Grant, Venango, Brandon and Wild Horse Spring. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 62 and 85. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 131 and 139. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
